## 2020 wildfire perimeters

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(geojsonsf)



fires <- geojson_sf("California_Fire_Perimeters_(1950%2B).geojson" )

recent_fires <- fires |>
  filter( YEAR_ == 2020 )

tmap_options( basemap.server = "USGS")
tmap_mode( "view" )
tm_shape( recent_fires ) +
  tm_polygons( id = "FIRE_NAME", fill = "firebrick")

```
